adjectives.description: delusional (comparative more delusional, superlative most delusional)

entries.meaning: Suffering from delusions; having false or faulty beliefs.
examples: You're delusional if you think that plan will work.

entries.meaning: Being or relating to a delusion.
examples: Delusional jealousy  […]  A delusional belief that one's partner is being unfaithful. This can occur as part of a wider psychotic illness, secondary to organic brain damage (e.g. following the 'punch drunk syndrome' in boxers),  […]

entries.meaning: A person suffering from a delusion.
